name: FTB Chunks Map
description: Navigating the world can be challenging, especially with all the cool stuff you can find in the modded world. $(l)A good map is an essential feature of any modpack$(reset), and knowing how to navigate it is crucial. This chapter takes a look at one alternative, $(#ffa500)$(l)FTB Chunks$(reset). It isnâ€™t just a mapping mod though: you can also use it to chunkload and protect your base!
